name: CATEGORY CHALLENGE
description:
'CATEGORY CHALLENGE' is a quiz game. The game will ask questions randomly, and there will be four answers below. The correct answer will enter the next question.
[Game operation]
Mouse click operation
[Game features]
The game contains many types of problems, and you can increase your knowledge in the process of playing the game.
At the beginning of the game, there will be a random type of questions, and you can go to the next level if you answer 5 questions correctly and 3 questions correctly.
The game is not difficult and suitable for children.
